original_text: He also that received seed among the thorns is he that heareth the word; and the care of this world, and the deceitfulness of riches, choke the word, and he becometh unfruitful.
korean_text: 가시떨기에 뿌려졌다는 것은 말씀을 들으나 세상의 염려와 재물의 유혹에 말씀이 막혀 결실하지 못하는 자요

sentences.original_text: He also that received seed among the thorns
sentences.korean_translation: 가시떨기 속에 씨를 받은 자도 또한

sentences.original_text: is he that heareth the word;
and the care of this world,
